Uses of Interface
java.awt.print.Pageable

Packages that use Pageable
java.awt.print Provides classes and interfaces for a general printing API. 
 

Uses of Pageable in java.awt.print
 

Classes in java.awt.print that implement Pageable
 class Book
          The Book class provides a representation of a document in which pages may have different page formats and page painters.
 

Methods in java.awt.print with parameters of type Pageable
abstract  void PrinterJob.setPageable(Pageable document)
          Queries document for the number of pages and the PageFormat and Printable for each page held in the Pageable instance, document.
